channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Verse-O-Matic

item.title: CVE-2021-24466|2024-08-03T19:35:19.451Z -- unknown -- verse-o-matic
item.description: The Verse-O-Matic WordPress plugin through 4.1.1 does not have any CSRF checks in place, allowing attackers to make logged in administrators do unwanted actions, such as add/edit/delete arbitrary verses and change the settings. Due to the lack of sanitisation in the settings and verses, this could also lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues
